title: XENIA — AI Study Suite
summary: Exploratory work on evolving an AI study planner into a modular study suite. Focus on learning workflows, scheduling intelligence, and adaptive feedback mechanisms.

title: Website Change Intelligence
summary: Prototype system for detecting meaningful structural changes in web content, prioritizing signal relevance over raw diffs.

title: Book Review Platform
summary: Conceptual application for structured book reviews with emphasis on insight capture and long-term recall.

title: Research Workflow Tracker
summary: Research-oriented tooling ideas for tracking hypotheses, literature, progress, and failed paths during exploratory work.

title: Failure Modes in ML Pipelines
summary: A reflective note documenting common failure modes encountered in experimental ML pipelines, including data leakage, silent metric inflation, and brittle assumptions.

title: When Models Generalize — and When They Don’t
summary: Exploration of generalization behavior across small-scale experiments, highlighting cases where apparent performance failed to transfer across data regimes.

title: AI Notes & Schedules from PDFs
summary: Experiments in extracting structured notes and schedules from academic PDFs using document intelligence techniques.

title: Expense Insights from Documents
summary: High-level exploration of summarizing expense patterns from semi-structured financial documents.

title: Patent Keyword Discovery
summary: Keyword-driven exploration of patent corpora to surface thematic and technological trends.

title: Electrician Assistant App
summary: Utility app concept aimed at assisting field electricians with references, checks, and workflows.

title: Visual Safety Anomaly Detection
summary: Early research into visual anomaly detection for safety-related monitoring scenarios.

title: Financial Loss Pattern Analysis
summary: Experimental analysis of financial data to identify recurring loss-related patterns and behaviors.

title: Sports Equipment Rental Platform
summary: Marketplace concept for short-term sports equipment rentals with basic inventory intelligence.

title: Stock Trend Exploration
summary: Exploratory work on identifying structural trends in market data using statistical techniques.

title: Custom Customer Support Engine
summary: Design exploration for customizable customer support workflows supported by automation.

title: Candle Fire Simulation
summary: Physics-inspired simulation exploring flame dynamics at small spatial scales.

title: Tidal Flooding Patterns
summary: Conceptual research into coastal and tidal flooding patterns using environmental data.

title: Emotion Analysis App
summary: Exploratory work on affect analysis from multimodal inputs with ethical constraints in mind.

title: Guitar Tabs & Chords AI
summary: Conceptual tooling for translating musical structures into playable guitar representations.

title: AI Mental Health Assistant
summary: Ethics-first research exploration of conversational systems for mental health support.

title: EMS Import Substitution Study
summary: Analytical study of imported electronics components to identify potential local manufacturing opportunities.

title: Environmental Monitoring Concepts
summary: High-level concepts for monitoring environmental anomalies using public data sources.

title: Audio Pattern Curiosity Project
summary: Lightweight audio pattern detection experiment built purely for curiosity and signal processing practice.

title: Dataset Visualization Tool
summary: Interactive visualization tool for uploaded datasets to support exploratory data analysis.
